content:
Hi all. I made the mistake of going into work office today (i.e. leaving my normal rustc computer at home) and I want to test a fix for #94998, but I am stuck because I am hitting this error when building stage1:

error: empty search path given via `-L`

error: could not compile `rustc_llvm` due to previous error
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
I know absolutely nothing about how x interacts with llvm when it has the compiler profile enabled (i.e. not building llvm from scratch). am I just dumb and need to install llvm or something?
